divs: Sighting DetailsWalking through a farmers market stationed in the Kingstowne Towne Centers lot,I find myself looking up at the bright blue sky at a small silhouette of what Ithought was an aircraft flying towards my direction. Facing southeast, I noticeda small, dark dot in front of a white cloud, and I tried focusing on itsuddenly it dropped down vertically, at a high rate but controlled speed, thanit made a right angle turn to the right and faded away. At first I thought itwas a large bird diving after its dinner but a bird would not fly, or should Isay, hover at a stationary position for a very long time. I observed this fixedobject for about 10 seconds, the vertical drop and 90 degrees turn took about 4seconds.I have designed an artists rendition jpeg pic if you would like a copy, pleaseemail me, thanks.
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Alexandria
There were no other sightings in Alexandria on or around June 6th 2003
